description:
Soma and Asahi’s battle begins! The theme of the battle is to cook a dish that has elements of the 5 cuisines of the world. The battle situation seems to be in favor of Asahi, who completed his dish first using his Crossed Knives technique. However, the dish Soma prepared was diner food?! Will his dish be any match for Asahi’s dish that had been acknowledged by the God’s Tongue?
Source: crunchyroll
